## Summary

- [ ] Added/updated ready news JSON files under `data/ready-news/YYYY-MM-DD/`
- [ ] Kept scope limited to ready-news data (or clearly documented extra changes)

## Ready News Checklist

- [ ] Every file is valid JSON (`*.json`)
- [ ] Required fields exist: `date`, `category`, `title`, `summary`, `body`, `sources`
- [ ] `category` is one of: `politics`, `economy`, `society`, `world`, `tech`, `culture`, `sports`, `entertainment`, `life`, `weather`
- [ ] `sources` is a non-empty array and each source has `name`, `url`
- [ ] `date` matches target folder name (`data/ready-news/YYYY-MM-DD/`)
